languages.text: {n}На мрачном каменном пьедестале перед вами расположилась замысловатая доска, отдаленно напоминающая поле для игры в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}. Миниатюрные фигуры темных и светлых {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, искусно вырезанные из оникса и призрачной кости, застыли в изящных позах друг против друга. Несколько из них опрокинуты, и на секунду вам кажется, что по выточенным в доске желобкам из-под фигур стекает свежая кровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На мрачном каменном пьедестале перед вами расположилась замысловатая доска, отдаленно напоминающая поле для игры в регицид. Миниатюрные фигуры темных и светлых {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдар{/g}, искусно вырезанные из оникса и призрачной кости, застыли в изящных позах друг против друга. Несколько из них опрокинуты, и на секунду вам кажется, что по выточенным в доске желобкам из-под фигур стекает свежая кровь.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}На мрачном каменном пьедестале перед вами расположилась замысловатая доска, отдаленно напоминающая поле для игры в {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}регицид{/g}. Миниатюрные фигуры темных и светлых {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, искусно вырезанные из оникса и призрачной кости, застыли в изящных позах друг против друга. Несколько из них опрокинуты, и на секунду вам кажется, что по выточенным в доске желобкам из-под фигур стекает свежая кровь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of dark and light {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and you have the momentary impression that fresh blood is running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

Miniature figurines of dark and light {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sobre el siniestro pedestal de piedra que tienes delante hay dispuesto un intrincado tablero de juego que guarda ciertas similitudes con el que usan los jugadores de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g}. Varias miniaturas de Drukhari y Aeldari, esculpidas hábilmente en ónice y hueso espectral, se enfrentan unas a otras en posturas elegantes. Algunas están volcadas, y durante un instante crees ver un hilillo de sangre fresca que asoma por debajo de las piezas y se filtra por unas finas muescas talladas en el tablero.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sobre el siniestro pedestal de piedra que tienes delante hay dispuesto un intrincado tablero de juego que guarda ciertas similitudes con el que usan los jugadores de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicidio{/g}. Varias miniaturas de {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} en tonos oscuros y claros, esculpidas hábilmente en ónice y hueso espectral, se enfrentan unas a otras en posturas elegantes. Algunas están volcadas, y durante un instante crees ver un hilillo de sangre fresca que asoma por debajo de las piezas y se filtra por unas finas muescas talladas en el tablero.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}目の前の厳かな石造りの台座の上には、{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}・プレイヤーが使うものとよく似た精巧な遊戯盤が置かれている。オニキスと幽骨で巧みに彫られたアシュリヤーニとデュカーリ像が、優雅なポーズで向かい合って鎮座している。そのうちのいくつかが倒されると、鮮血が駒の下から盤に刻まれた小さな溝へ伝うのをあなたは一瞬見た気がした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前の厳かな石造りの台座の上には、{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}レジサイド{/g}・プレイヤーが使うものとよく似た精巧な遊戯盤が置かれている。オニキスと幽骨で巧みに彫られたアシュリヤーニとデュカーリ像が、優雅なポーズで向かい合って鎮座している。そのうちのいくつかが倒されると、鮮血が駒の下から盤に刻まれた小さな溝へ伝うのをあなたは一瞬見た気がした。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}在你面前的冰冷石头基座上，放置着一个复杂的棋盘，看起来与{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}棋盘大致相似。黑白两色的黑暗灵族与方舟灵族雕像，由黑玛瑙与灵骨巧妙雕刻而成，以优雅的姿势彼此相对。几枚棋子已经倒下了，有一瞬间，你似乎看到棋子下面渗出了鲜血，顺着棋盘上的小凹槽流下来。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你面前的冰冷石头基座上，放置着一个复杂的棋盘，看起来与{g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}弑君棋{/g}棋盘大致相似。黑白两色的微型{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}雕像由黑玛瑙与灵骨巧妙雕刻而成，以优雅的姿势彼此相对。几枚棋子已经倒下了，有一瞬间，你似乎看到棋子下面渗出了鲜血，顺着棋盘上的小凹槽流下来。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Placé sur un sinistre piédestal juste devant vous se trouve un plateau de jeu complexe, relativement similaire à celui utilisé par les joueurs de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g}. De petites figurines représentent des Drukharis et des Asuryanis. Elles sont taillées avec habileté dans de l'onyx et de la moelle spectrale et sont figées les unes face aux autres. Plusieurs d'entre elles sont renversées et pendant un instant, vous pensez apercevoir du sang frais couler des pions dans les petits sillons creusés dans le plateau.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Placé sur un sinistre piédestal juste devant vous se trouve un plateau de jeu complexe, relativement similaire à celui utilisé par les joueurs de {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}régicide{/g}. De petites figurines noires et blanches représentent des {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}. Elles sont taillées avec habileté dans de l'onyx et de la moelle spectrale et sont figées les unes face aux autres. Plusieurs d'entre elles sont renversées et pendant un instant, vous pensez apercevoir du sang frais couler des pions dans les petits sillons creusés dans le plateau.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auf einem düsteren Steinpodest vor dir steht ein aufwändig verziertes Spielbrett, ganz ähnlich wie jenes, das für {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g} verwendet wird. Kleine Figuren von Drukhari und Asuryani, kunstfertig geschnitzt aus Onyk und Phantomkristall, sind in eleganten Posen eingefroren. Mehrere sind umgefallen, und einen Augenblick lang glaubst du, unter den Spielfiguren frisches Blut zu sehen, das in die kleinen Rillen auf dem Brett fließt.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf einem dunklen Steinsockel vor dir befindet sich ein kompliziertes Spielbrett, das weitgehend an {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Königsmord{/g} erinnert. Miniaturfiguren von dunklen und hellen {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} stehen sich in eleganten Posen gegenüber. Sie wurden meisterhaft aus Onyx und Phantomkristall verarbeitet. Mehrere Figuren liegen umgekippt herum. Ganz kurz glaubst du, unter den Spielfiguren frisches Blut zu erkennen, das durch die kleinen eingeritzten Rillen im Brett läuft.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Önünde duran taştan yapılma, uğursuz kaideye çetrefilli bir oyun tahtası yerleştirilmiş. {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Kral Katili{/g} oyuncularının kullandığı tahtalara benziyor. Oniks ve tayfkemikten büyük bir yetenekle oyulmuş Drukhari ve Asuryani figürleri; birbirlerine karşı zarif vaziyetlerde donakalmış, pek çoğu da devrilmiş. Bir anda bir şey gördüğünü sanıyorsun... Sanki tahtaya oyulmuş küçük oluklara taşların altından taze kan akıyor.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Placed on a grim stone pedestal in front of you is an intricate game board, broadly similar to the one {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}regicide{/g} players use. Miniature figurines of Drukhari and Asuryani, skilfully fashioned out of onyx and wraithbone, are frozen in elegant poses opposite each other. Several of them are toppled, and for a moment you think you see fresh blood running from under the game pieces down the small grooves carved into the board.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Önünde duran taştan yapılma uğursuz kaideye çetrefilli bir oyun tahtası yerleştirilmiş. Genel olarak {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Kral Katili{/g} oyuncularının kullandığı tahtalara benziyor. Oniks ve tayfkemikten büyük bir yetenekle oyulmuş Drukhari ile Asuryani figürleri, birbirlerine karşı zarif vaziyetlerde donakalmış. Aralarından pek çoğu devrilmiş. Bir anlığına tahtaya oyulmuş küçük oluklara oyun parçalarının altından taze kan aktığını gördüğünü sanıyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Önünde duran taştan yapılma, uğursuz kaideye çetrefilli bir oyun tahtası yerleştirilmiş. {g|Encyclopedia:Regicide}Kral Katili{/g} oyuncularının kullandığı tahtalara benziyor. Oniks ve tayfkemikten büyük bir yetenekle oyulmuş Drukhari ve Asuryani figürleri; birbirlerine karşı zarif vaziyetlerde donakalmış, pek çoğu da devrilmiş. Bir anda bir şey gördüğünü sanıyorsun... Sanki tahtaya oyulmuş küçük oluklara taşların altından taze kan akıyor.{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}{/g}
